main event: A civilian witnessed a bright light in the sky which seemed to hover and then rapidly ascend into the clouds in Cheltenham, Maryland on February 12, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a bright white light with no sound emitted., The object was observed for a duration of 4 minutes., The witness thought the object might be an aircraft but questioned its characteristics as it did not behave like one., The object disappeared straight up into the clouds., The report references previous sightings in the area, suggesting this may not have been an isolated incident.
